code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'./slices/authSlice';import categoryReducer from'./slices/categorySlice';import productReducer from'./slices/productSlice';import discountReducer from'./slices/discountSlice';const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,categories:categoryReducer,products:productReducer,discounts:discountReducer}});export default store;
